TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TasksFolder extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.Folder

Docs.summary: Represents a folder containing task items.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeService service) cil managed

Docs.param: The ExchangeService object to which the tasks folder will be bound.
Docs.summary: Initializes an unsaved local instance of. To bind to an existing tasks folder, use TasksFolder.Bind() instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.TasksFolder Bind(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeService service, class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId id) cil managed
Public Shared Function Bind (service As ExchangeService, id As FolderId) As TasksFolder

Docs.param: The service to use to bind to the tasks folder.
The Id of the tasks folder to bind to.
Docs.summary: Binds to an existing tasks folder and loads its first class properties. Calling this method results in a call to EWS.
Docs.returns: A TasksFolder instance representing the task folder corresponding to the specified Id.

Docs.param: The service to use to bind to the tasks folder.
The name of the tasks folder to bind to.
Docs.summary: Binds to an existing tasks folder and loads its first class properties. Calling this method results in a call to EWS.
Docs.returns: A TasksFolder instance representing the tasks folder with the specified name.
